turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you place a starbucks order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure whatre you getting this time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Caramel frappuccino please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: um, get the grande this time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk will be fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want anything extra added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah get it with 2 extra pumps of espresso

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what about cinnamon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no cinnamon on this one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: am i just getting the one coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah just the one coffee for me please, unless you also wanted one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanaks but no thanks ive already had my coffee today

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: then yep, just the one will do thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: absolutely, no problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: when is it going to be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they said itll be ready shortly, ill have the reciept sent to your email

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you so much
